definition: of or relating to or employed in social rites or rituals, stereotyped behavior
details:
adjective
- of or relating to or employed in social rites or rituals
= example: of or relating to or employed in social rites or rituals
- of or relating to or characteristic of religious rituals
= example: of or relating to or characteristic of religious rituals
noun
- stereotyped behavior
- any customary observance or practice
= synonyms: rite
- the prescribed procedure for conducting religious ceremonies
